testcase.name: Payment Action
testcase.system-out: Given User on the Home page.................................................passed When User clicks Cart button................................................passed And User clicks on Pay button...............................................passed Then Payment Page must be visible...........................................passed When User clicks on the Wallets.............................................passed Then User should be able to pay using one of the Wallets....................passed When User clicks on the Food Card...........................................passed Then User should be able to pay using Card..................................passed When User clicks on the Credit or Debit Cards...............................passed Then User Should be able to pay using Credit or Debit Cards after entering the card details.passed When User clicks on the Net Banking.........................................passed Then User selects the bank by which user want to pay amount.................passed When User clicks on the more................................................passed Then User clicks on the Cash On Delivery Option and will place the order....passed
